author: floriandimsky
post_text: February 17, 2016 at 4:25 PM#1Hi,is it possible to create a Macro that search For a preset of one fixture in a sequence and Replace that Preset with a new one?And how it Works?Thanks

posts.author: floriandimsky
posts.post_text: February 17, 2016 at 4:25 PM#1Hi,is it possible to create a Macro that search For a preset of one fixture in a sequence and Replace that Preset with a new one?And how it Works?Thanks

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: February 17, 2016 at 8:44 PM#2There is a macro for that in the auto create macro pool.syntax is :Replace Preset (old preset number x.y)  With Preset (New preset number x.y)  If Sequence (Sequence number?)

title: Search and replace
